articles.author: Amit Kumar
articles.title: India vs Pakistan: How Pakistan captain Babar Azam is preparing for Asia Cup 2023 clash vs India - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: Babar Azam is simultaneously acclimatising himself to the Sri Lankan conditions, while keeping his focus on the much-anticipated high-octane Asia Cup

articles.author: Aaditya Narayan in Chennai
articles.title: Asian Champions Trophy: India made to sweat in victory against Korea after error-ridden final quarter - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: India's turgid display in the fourth quarter against Korea has allowed coach Fulton to see another facet of his side before the Asian Games, and it could well be one they need as they look to book their tickets to Paris 2024 next month.
articles.content: Just a day after Craig Fulton cited India's fitness levels as the cause of a superb second-half performance against Malaysia, his team turned in a turgid final quarter performance against Korea but h… [+3069 chars]
